did.abstract: Collection includes personal correspondence containing information on social customs and economic conditions of plantation owners and businessmen. Included are references to the Seminole War; difficulties between the United States and France, 1836; cotton crops, 1849; and prices for land and slaves in Charleston, 1857.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: John Christopher Faber was a physician from Spartanburg (Spartanburg Co.), S.C.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection includes personal correspondence containing information on social customs and economic conditions of plantation owners and businessmen. Included are references to the Seminole War; difficulties between the United States and France, 1836; cotton crops, 1849; and prices for land and slaves in Charleston, 1857.
